channel.title: Vue.js on Preslav Rachev
channel.description: Recent content in Vue.js on Preslav Rachev

item.description: All of my Vue.js apps are being developed by proxying API calls to a remote server. This is why one of the first things I do with a new Vue.js app is to st up a vue.config.js file: module.exports = { devServer: { proxy: { "/": { target: "https://remote-server.com", changeOrigin: true } } } }; When calling yarn serve, I get the following message flashing in the developer console:
